comment: A very interesting one here. Major fruit on the nose and palate with a slight burn on the back end. The cognac definitely comes through on this one. Pretty good, but different.
sweet, candyish. with ice licorice comes out. not a fan
very sweet on the nose as you'd expect. Banana with some vanilla flavors. A  medium finish with a slightly peppery finish to what I expected
Sweet nose, overly smooth back.  Sweet.
Intense apricot, apple, fig. Like candy.
banana in nose and mouth, very light and sweet. very poor
Sweet (light berry) sipping with a sweet lingering finish. Fantastic with English toffee.
rock.  little sweet fruit nose.   no bite at first but come back around.    smooth not salty or peeted
Very smooth with a sweet finish, but not a flavored whisky sweet.  Very unique.
